Class RMIClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • RMIClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, ClientInterface

    public class RMIClient
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements ClientInterface
    Class that represents a RMIClient
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.rmi.server.RemoteObject

        ref

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void authentication(boolean isLogin, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Handles the authentication of an user, validating and making the necessary verifications.
      void connectToRMIServer()
      Connects the client to the PrimaryRMIServer and gives it its reference.
      void controlCTRLC()
      When a CTRL-C is set, this thread captures it and makes the user loggout, so that the RMIServer knows the RMIClients connect at all times.
      void establishConnection()
      Remote method used by the new PrimaryRMIServer(former Backup) to reestablish the Client-Server connection.
      void grantPrivileges(java.lang.String username)
      Handles the grant privileges operation, validating, making the necessary verifications and conceding the privilege.
      void indexNewURL(java.lang.String url)
      Handles the index new URL operation, validating and making the necessary verifications.
      void linksPointing(java.lang.String url)
      Handles the links with connection to another link operation, validating, making the necessary verifications and displaying the results.
      void logout(boolean result)
      Handles the logout of an user, validating and making the necessary verifications.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method that creates a RMIClient object
      void notification()
      Remote method used by the PrimaryRMIServer that prints a live notification to a user.
      void printTop10(java.lang.String[] parameters)
      Auxiliar method to print the RTS.
      void realTimeStatistics()
      Handles the RTS operation, retrieving the first update.
      void rtsUpdate(java.lang.String msg)
      Remote method used by the RMIServer to make the Client print a new rtsUpdate.
      void search(java.lang.String[] words)
      Handles the search operation, validating, making the necessary verifications and printing the results.
      void searchHistory()
      Handles the search history operation, validating, making the necessary verifications and printing the results.
      void shutdown()
      Handles the shutdown of an user, validating and making the necessary verifications.
